description.en: Back in high school, Maki and Midori were in love, until graduation came and the two of them went their seperate ways. However, ten years later, Maki has a chance reunion with Midori - and finds that while her feelings haven't changed, Midori has.

title.en: Inkya de Wotaku de Binbou Dakedo Bijin Ojou-sama ni Osaretemasu

altTitles.ja: 陰キャでヲタクで貧乏だけど美人お嬢様に推されてます

altTitles.ja-ro: Inkya de Wotaku de Binbou Dakedo Bijin Ojou-sama ni Osaretemasu

altTitles.pt-br: Eu sou um otaku tímido e pobre, mas essa jovem linda e rica está obcecada por mim

altTitles.ru: Я застенчивый и бедный отаку, но эта красивая богатая юная леди одержима мной.

altTitles.en: I'm a Shy and Poor Otaku, but This Beautiful Rich Young Lady Is Obsessed With Me

description.en: Eiji is a high school student who lives with his father, an unsuccessful novelist. He is a shy, otaku, and poor boy, but he is an honest boy who never forgets the compassion for others that his late mother taught him. Even he yearns for Aoi, the daughter of the president of a large company. However, Eiji is unable to look Aoi in the eye because of the huge disparity between her and himself. One day after school, Aoi greets Eiji when he comes home. Aoi says one surprising thing to the surprised Eiji...
description.ja:
YouTube動画で550万再生！　運命に導かれたベタ甘ラブコメ！
エイジは陰キャでヲタクで貧乏だけど他人に対する思いやりの気持ちを忘れない素直な少年。そんなエイジも憧れる社長令嬢アオイさんがある日、エイジの自宅を訪れ、突如としてエイジとの婚約を告げるが…。

Yūchūbu dōga de 550 man saisei! Unmei ni michibika reta beta ama rabu kome! Eiji wa in kya de wotaku de binbōdakedo tanin ni taisuru omoiyari no kimochi o wasurenai sunaona shōnen. Son'na eiji mo akogareru shachō reijō aoi-san ga aru hi, eiji no jitaku o otozure, totsujotoshite eiji to no kon'yaku o tsugeruga….
description.ru: Эйдзи — старшеклассник, живущий со своим отцом, неудачливым писателем. Он застенчивый, отаку, бедный, но честный мальчик, который никогда не забывает о сострадании к другим, как его научила покойная мать. Он тоскует по Аой, дочери президента крупной компании. Однако, Эйдзи не может смотреть Аой в глаза из-за огромного несоответствия между ней и им самим. Однажды после школы Аой приветствует Эйдзи, когда тот приходит домой. Аой говорит удивленному Эйдзи одну удивительную вещь...
description.pt-br: Eiji é um estudante do ensino médio que vive com seu pai, um romancista malsucedido. Ele é um baita nerd, e mesmo sendo pobre é um menino obediente que não esquece a compaixão alheia que sua falecida mãe lhe ensinou. Aoi, filha do presidente de uma grande empresa, admira essa idade. No entanto, Eiji não conseguia nem olhar para a enorme disparidade consigo mesmo. Depois da escola um dia, Aoi cumprimenta Eiji quando ela chega em casa. Eiji fica surpreso quando Aoi lhe diz uma palavra de surpresa...

altTitles.ja: ワンサイドインルーム

description.en: [I'm afraid of falling in love too much.] The most popular guy in college x the shy and frustrating campus life of a Buddha-faced man! -- Oka, a college student with bad eyes and who is kept away from others, is in love with Saeki, a good-looking guy from the same university. Shortly after entering the school, Saeki kissed him and said, ``You're cute,'' as a new member of the club, and he suddenly approached him. After that, they were completely absorbed in the house, and they ended up doing more than just kissing. Oka thinks that Saeki is interested in him on a whim, but contrary to his seemingly relaxed attitude, Saeki is also becoming serious about Oka.

title.en: Latna Saga: Survival of a Sword King

altTitles.en: The Survival Story of the Sword King in Another World

altTitles.ru: История выживания короля меча в фэнтезийном мире

altTitles.th: การเอาชีวิตรอดของราชาดาบในต่างโลก

description.en:
After being recently discharged from military service and just drifting through life, Hanbin Ryu is suddenly transported to another world.

However, his “guide line,” the system bestowed upon him to help with his survival and growth, was filled with errors, causing him to be stuck in the tutorial stage for over 20 years.

When he is finally released from this personal hell, he finds everyone has turned against otherworlders like him. Just how will this low-level, super-tutorial newbie survive?

---

**Links:**
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mLzbAKkDpYM)
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4%EA%B3%84-%EA%B2%80%EC%99%95-%EC%83%9D%EC%A1%B4%EA%B8%B0/2363)
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E7%95%B0%E7%95%8C%E5%8A%8D%E7%8E%8B%E7%94%9F%E5%AD%98%E8%A8%98/66)
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/6885/)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/34782)
- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%9A%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%95%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%82%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%81/103)
description.fr: Transféré contre sa volonté dans un tutoriel où il doit lutter pour survivre, Ryu Hanbin y reste finalement coincé pendant 22 ans. Il est bloqué par un bug au niveau 4, et ce malgré la grande quantité d'XP qu'il accumule ! Quand il est finalement transféré dans le monde de Latna, le contraste entre sa puissance et son niveau lui pose bien des difficultés. Mais finalement, le véritable objectif n'est-il pas de vivre plutôt que de survivre ?
description.ja: ｢あなたは適合者として選ばれました｣ ｢あなたの能力でセルハラトナに生き残る確率は５％未満です｣ ｢自殺しますか？」 ニート生活から突如として異世界へ飛ばされた！そこはレベル5までを目指す初心者エリアだったが、「ガイドライン」のエラーでレベル5になっても再びレベル1になるという、地獄の日々を送ることになり？！ レベル5の裏に隠された、とてつもない能力とはー
description.ko:
『귀하는 적합자로 선택받았습니다』

『귀하의 재능으로 셀하 라트나에서 생존할 확률은 5% 미만입니다』

『자살하시겠습니까? Y/N』

“x-까.”

5% 미만의 생존 확률. 22년의 시간. 셀 수도 없는 마견과의 사투.
이 지옥에서, 나는 홀로 살아남았다.

5라는 레벨 뒤에 감춰진, 무지막지한 히든 스탯들과 함께!

대검 하나로 이계를 썰어버리는,
사상 최강의 레벨5 검사 류한빈의 극한 사이다 생존기!
description.ru: В момент, когда его переместили в другой мир, Рю Хан-Бин был обычным человеком, который недавно вернулся из армии. Хоть он и остался один в пустынном мире с кучей монстров, ему дали задание - стать сильнее. Но есть одна проблема - "система", которая должна была давать подсказки, полна недоработок.
description.th:
รยูฮันบิน ชายผู้เพิ่งปลดประจำการทหารมาได้เพียงสามเดือน จู่ๆ ก็ถูกพาไปยังโลกแปลกๆ ที่เขาไม่รู้จักมาก่อน ชื่อว่า 'เซลฮา แลตนา'
พร้อมมีข้อความขึ้นว่า ""คุณได้รับเลือกในฐานะผู้เข้าเกณฑ์อันทรงเกียรติ"" พร้อมกับไกด์ไลน์ที่บอกให้สู้กับมอนสเตอร์ และเพิ่มให้ถึงเลเวล 5 เพื่อไปยังพื้นที่ถัดไป แต่ด้วยระบบเกิดข้อผิดพลาด ทำให้เขาต้องติดอยู่ในนั้นนับสิบปี ที่นั่นมีเพียงเขาแค่คนเดียวกับสุนัขปีศาจ
อยู่มาวันหนึ่งเขาสามารถเพิ่มถึงเลเวล 5 ได้สำเร็จ และถูกส่งไปยังพื้นที่ต่อไปแบบไม่ทันตั้งตัว

การผจญภัยเพื่อหาทางเอาชีวิตรอดในต่างโลกของเขาได้เริ่มต้นขึ้นแล้ว
เขาจะหาทางออกไปจากโลกแห่งนี้ และมีชีวิตรอดไปได้หรือไม่
description.zh: 一个俗套的穿越后带挂升级故事，却因为外挂系统的运算错误而偏离方向。 渴望变强的他被困在新手村二十年，不断的战斗却始终无法提升等级。 九亿次拔剑，九亿次搏杀，他脚踩着尸山血海缓步走来。 “恭喜，您即将被传送出新手村…” 蛰伏的凶兽露出爪牙，万物都将屈服于他拔剑的光辉之下！
description.zh-hk:
「依照你的能力，
你在瑟哈拉特那活下來的機率低於5%。」

「你要自殺嗎? Yes or No?」

「三X啊。」

不到5%的生存機率、22年的時間、
與魔犬纏鬥了無數次，
我一個人...在這座地獄中生存了下來。

在5等的背後，潛藏著無比強大的隱藏數值!

帶著一把巨劍殺爆異界，堪稱史上最強的5等劍士，
柳寒頻生存記，看了保證超過癮!

description.en: The light is gone. Unable to escape the darkness, Pieta repeats the same day. Every day she walks to school down the same road, through the same rain, then has the same conversation with her friend Danae. Eventually, she finds happiness in the repetition. The days carry on as normal, until one day, her routine chat with Danae takes a different turn: "What?! You can remember the today that happened yesterday too?" Despite their bleak situation, the girls reach towards tomorrow!

Super serious and uptight high school student Koutaro Suzuki and his obnoxious gyaru kouhai Sorako Mozu get along like cats and dogs. She spends her days tormenting him, while he spends his days getting outraged by her. However, the two of them share a secret...that they're living together as fiancés!! Under the condition that Koutaro marry Sorako, who comes from a wealthy real estate family, they've agreed to buy his father's company and save it from going under!!

Having to deal with Sorako, who uses this and that (and you know what) to torment him, can Koutaro make her yield and successfully marry her?!

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative Official Raw on Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/64744)
description.ja: クソ真面目で融通が利かない男子高校生・鈴紀光太郎は生意気な後輩ギャル・百舌そら子と犬猿の仲。そんな二人には秘密が…それは二人が許嫁関係で同棲していること!? 資産家の家族を持つそら子と結婚をする条件で、光太郎は潰れる寸前の父の会社を買収してもらっていたのだ!! あの手この手（エッ●なこと）で責めるメスガキそら子にたいし、光太郎は彼女を屈服させ、無事に結婚をすることができるのか――!!?

description.en: An orphan named Raul was taken in by the vampire Rose. Raul worked hard for Rose's sake, and as a result, he became incredibly muscular. This is the story of Raul, now buff and strong, and Rose, the eternally youthful vampire, enjoying their fun daily life together!

An only slightly particular ability hidden from others, a power of no benefit to anyone, yet recently because of it I can't help but be interested in you.  
  
Highlighting the secrets of 5 people and their slow-going feelings towards another…   
  
A series by the author of I Want To Eat Your Pancreas, Sumino Yoru, and the artist of Kanojo wa Rokurokubi, Nieki Zui. Sumino has previously released a Novel with the same name which this series is based on. The artist is working on this series, published in Gekkan Komikku @ Banchi, as well as Jun and Kaoru, published in Bessatsu Shounen Magazine, simultaneously.
description.es:
Una habilidad poco particular escondida a los demás, un poder que no beneficia a nadie, pero recientemente como consecuencia de ello no puedo evitar interesarme por ti.  
Destacando los secretos de 5 personas y sus sentimientos paulatinamente hacia otro…  
  
Una serie del autor de "Quiero comerme tu páncreas", Sumino Yoru, y el artista de Kanojo wa Rokurokubi, Nieki Zui. Sumino ha lanzado previamente una novela con el mismo nombre en la que se basa esta serie. El artista está trabajando en esta serie, publicada en Gekkan Komikku @ Banchi, así como en Jun y Kaoru, publicada en la revista Bessatsu Shounen, simultáneamente.
description.pt-br: Uma sutil habilidade particular escondida dos outros, um poder sem benefício para qualquer um, e mesmo assim, eu não consigo evitar de estar interessado em você. Contando os segredos de 5 pessoas e seus lentos sentimentos um pelo outro...

description.en: This is a story about a prodigal son who, while squandering his money in various ways, beats up a group of destined men.

altTitles.ja: アウトサイダー パラダイス

description.en: From the author of Asobi Asobase comes a new comedy series, about… the Art Club from Asobi Asobase.

How far can someone bully you until you snap? Daimon has had to endure Kojima's relentless teasing and nagging at work, to the point that bullying Daimon became customary inside the company. But could Kojima's attitude be because he actually likes Daimon? Let's find out!

He was born fast. He had nothing else, only the ability to run fast. It gave him "a place at school" and "a bridge between friends." That was all the boy had. Then he met another boy who ran to forget the hardships in life. He was not fast by any means, but he had passion. The passion was infectious, and he gradually came to feel the same excitement. But that was the beginning of the "abnormality."
Mio and Subaru live together in a small apartment avoiding attention. While they masquerade as siblings with an age gap, Subaru holds a secret.

title.en: Other Than My Friend's Sister, Something Else

description.en: Seula has endured a long-standing crush, thinking that being friends would be enough. But when she learns Areum has accepted her boyfriend’s proposal, she breaks down. To soothe her torn heart, she gets drunk and calls her, confessing her feelings. The next day, she wakes up naked next to Areum’s sister, Daun! When Seula begins to piece the pieces of what happened together, she begs Daum to keep this a secret from Areum, to which Daum agrees under one condition… “Want to keep having a good time together?”

title.en: I Rely On Plug-Ins To Hunt Gods

altTitles.en: I Rely on Cheat to Hunt Gods

description.en: Main character Zhang Yi was betrayed by his best friend and lover, he was then reborn back to the day [Apocalypse] arrived. With his memories from his past life, Zhang Yi will challenge God at the opening. In order to gain the strength to defeat the people that betrayed him, Zhang Yi will use his knowledge to obtain a God-weapon, and begin to grow stronger and stronger, at the same time exploring the unknown secrets of the apocalyptic world…
description.zh: 主角张奕在上一世天启八年遭到兄弟和爱人的背叛而死，重生后回到了【天启】降临的那天。凭借着上一世的记忆，张奕在开局得到了亿里挑一的神级天赋。为了能够手刃背叛他的敌人，张奕利用天赋与从上一世带来的超级神器，在这一世开始追逐更为强大的强大，同时也开始探索关于天启世界那些不为人知的秘密……

title.en: Okinawa de Suki ni Natta Ko ga Hougen Sugite Tsura Sugiru

altTitles.en: The Girl I Fell in Love With in Okinawa Speaks in a Heavy Dialect and It's Too Much of a Pain

altTitles.ja: 沖縄で好きになった子が方言すぎてツラすぎる

altTitles.ru: Девушка, в которую я влюбился на Окинаве, говорит на очень трудном диалекте, и с ней сложно общаться

description.en: I, Nakamura Teruaki, transferred to Okinawa and I'm in love with Kyan, but I don't understand her dialect. Higa is always helping me out by interpreting the dialect... A slightly unusual cross-cultural romance on a tropical island is about to begin!
description.ja: 俺・中村照秋は、沖縄に転校し、好きな人も出来たが、喜屋武さん(好きな人)の方言が分からない。好きな人の方言を通訳してくれる比嘉さんには、いつも助けられてばかりいる…。 南の島でちょっぴり変わった異文化恋愛スタート‼
description.ru: Я, Тэруаки Накамура, перевёлся в школу на Окинаве и влюбился в девушку по имени Кян-сан, но я не понимаю её диалект. Хига-сан всегда помогает мне, переводя диалект. На южном острове начинается несколько иная культурная любовь.

title.en: Kimochi Warui kara Kimi ga Suki

altTitles.ja: きもちわるいから君がすき

altTitles.zh: 恶心至极的你最喜欢了

altTitles.en: I Love You Because You Creep Me Out

description.en: Tsukasa, who falls in love with her best friend Yoriko, hides her feeling and continues her daily life. In the meantime, Yoriko also seems to have deep affection to Tsukasa. This is a precious, pure, and disgusting story of their sick love.
description.ja:
親友である依子(よりこ)のことが好きな司(つかさ)は、
今日も気持ちを隠して日常を送る。

一方依子も司に対して
“トクベツ”な感情を持っているようで…？

尊くて純粋できもちわるい、
おもいあいの物語。

description.en: The last Mayabi War begins in Ayuta, where the gods' seal was released.

They were childhood friends, and she had always been more powerful than him. But when they accidentally traveled (summoned?) to another world, it was finally time for him to become the knight in shining armor! He had to find her first though, since they were separated… Come and witness his fight to be better in a crazy world where monsters roamed and technology was so advanced your amputated limbs could be restored to perfection…

altTitles.th: พลัส อนิมา

description.en:
Beings who possess animal-like powers walk among humans in this alternate universe. These mysterious mutants, the +Anima, are shunned by society. Four outcasts in particular–Cooro, a boy with crow-like powers; Husky, a fish-boy; Senri, a bear +Anima; and a girl named Nana, who wields the power of the bat–search for others like themselves while trying to gain acceptance in a world cruel to anyone or anything that is different.

- [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/%2BAnima)
description.pt-br: Os seres que possuem poderes como dos animais andam entre seres humanos neste universo paralelo. Estes mutantes misteriosos, os +Anima, são desprezados pela sociedade. Quatro deles em particular -Cooro, um menino com poderes de corvo; Husky, um menino-peixe; Senri, um urso +Anima; e uma menina chamada Nana que domina o poder do morcego- procuram por outros como eles, enquanto tentam ganhar aceitação em um mundo cruel para qualquer um ou qualquer coisa que é diferente.

description.en: A group of nine boys (called the Hikari Club) are intent on making the Ultimate AI. The attractive leader of the club, Zera, is a twisted man polluting the minds of the club members to make them do whatever he pleases. Tamiya, the original founder of the club, wants to reclaim the club. Niko, the second in command, is pissed off at Jaibo, the one obsessed with Zera. They kidnap a schoolgirl, but the AI Raichi falls in love with her and she with him, and things get messy.
description.pl:
"Jestem człowiekiem. Tak zostałem zaprogramowany."  
Chłopcy z przemysłowego miasteczka mają tylko jeden jasny punkt w życiu: Hikari Club, sekretne bractwo, które zorganizowali w porzuconej fabryce. Ich koronnym projektem jest stworzenie "myślącej maszyny" napędzanej owocami liczi. Jednak bojaźliwa solidarność gimnazjalistów szybko przekształca się w nacjonalistyczno-socjalistyczne bagno morderczej paranoi, perwersyjnego estetyzmu i (nie zawsze) tłumionego homoseksualizmu. Club to do tej pory najdoskonalsza praca Usamaru Furuyi. Oto Władca Much nowego wieku, choć to dzieło nigdy nie zostanie jedną z lektur szkolnych.

altTitles.ja: アズールレーン４コママンガ　びそくぜんしんっ！

description.en: Official 4-koma webcomic from the popular mobile game Azur Lane.

I thought it was just platonic, spending the rest of our lives together as nothing more than friends… That was until Han Jei broke the news: “Seojin, I’m getting married.” 

Seojin, who was adopted to Germany when he was a child, has maintained a 15 year long relationship with Jei. When confronted with the prospect of Jei’s marriage, he realizes he’s in love with him. Working as a pilot, Seojin moves back to Korea in an attempt to run away, but his plan starts to unravel when Jei boards the flight to follow him. The two find themselves living together in Korea as Jei’s wedding date rapidly approaches. 

“Seojin, you’re not acting like this because of me, are you?”

As Seojin tries to push Jei away due to his emerging desires and Jei wishes to rekindle their precious friendship, they spend more time with each other and the tension between them begins to arise…
description.fr: "Je pensais que c'était juste platonique, passer le reste de notre vie ensemble comme de simples amis..." C'était jusqu'à ce que Han Jei annonce la nouvelle : "Seo Jin, je vais me marier." Seo Jin, qui a été adopté en Allemagne lorsqu'il était enfant, entretient une relation de 15 ans avec Jei. Lorsqu'il est confronté à la perspective du mariage de Jei, il se rend compte qu'il est amoureux de lui. Travaillant comme pilote, Seo Jin retourne en Corée pour tenter de s'enfuir, mais son plan commence à s'effondrer lorsque Jei monte à bord du vol pour le suivre. Les deux se retrouvent à vivre ensemble en Corée alors que la date du mariage de Jei approche à grands pas. "Seo Jin, tu n'agis pas comme ça à cause de moi, n'est-ce pas ?" Alors que Seo Jin essaie de repousser Jei en raison de ses désirs émergents et que Jei souhaite raviver leur précieuse amitié, ils passent plus de temps ensemble et la tension entre eux commence à surgir...
description.ko: 우정이라고 생각했다. 가장 가까운 곳에서 평생을 함께할, ...그냥 친구. "서진아, 나 결혼해." 한재이가 청천벽력 같은 소식을 전하기 전까지는. 어린 시절 독일로 입양되어 재이와 15년간 우정을 지켜온 서진. 그의 결혼이라는 현실과 맞닥뜨리고서야 재이에 대한 감정이 사랑이었음을 깨닫게 된다. 항공사 기장으로 근무하던 서진은 도망치듯 한국으로 이직하지만 재이가 서진을 따라 한국행 비행기에 오르며 계획은 점점 더 어긋나게 된다. 재이의 결혼을 앞둔 채 한국에서 아슬한 동거를 시작하게 된 두 사람. "서진아, 혹시 나 때문에 그러는 건 아니지?" 자꾸만 피어나는 욕심에 그를 밀어내려는 서진과 소중한 친구를 되찾고 싶은 재이, 함께하는 시간이 길어질수록 두 사람 사이에는 미묘한 분위기가 흐르는데…

description.en:
Sakata Gintoki is a samurai living in an era when samurai are no longer needed.  
  
To add to his troubles, oppressive aliens have moved in to invade. Gintoki lives with Kagura and Shinpachi, taking on odd jobs to make the world a better place… and to pay their rent.

[Official English*](https://www.viz.com/gin-tama)
***Viz Media quietly discontinued Gintama after Volume 23 of the manga (released in English in 2011). As of 2024, Viz has not made any additional comments on Gintama's publication.**
description.pl:
Kosmici zwani Amanto postanowili podbić kolejną planetę, a że padło na Ziemię… Cóż, zwykły pech. Wojna przyszła, poszła, a kosmici… Zostali, wpływając znacząco na rozwój technologiczny. W takim oto dziwnym świecie przyszło żyć Gintokiemu – chłopak najmuje się do każdej, nawet najczarniejszej roboty. Jeśli masz więc problem, nie zależnie od tego czy dotyczy on walki z pszczołami z innej planety, czy może zastępowania schorowanego personelu w barze transwestytów, zgłoś się do niego.  
Ayanami - 18 grudnia 2010
description.ru: Захватив Землю, пришельцы Аманто запретили ношение мечей, и единственный, в ком ещё жив подлинно японский дух — самоуверенный сластёна Гинтоки Саката. Неуклюжий очкарик Шинпачи нанялся к нему в ученики. Третьим в их команде стала прелестная Кагура из сильнейшего во Вселенной клана Ято, а с ней её питомец Садахару — пёсик размером с бегемота, обладающий забавной привычкой грызть головы всем, кто под морду подвернётся. Они называют себя «мастерами на все руки» и выполняют любые заказы — главное, чтобы заплатили…

description.en:
the Grand Hybrid, born from the union of angels and demons, is believed to possess the highest lineage among hybrids. When awakened, this extraordinary being, known as the ‘Apex Hybrid’, is said to have the power to blow up the universe.

Contrary to Jake’s desire for a simple and ordinary life, angels and devils eventually seek him out as the ultimate ‘Apex Hybrid’. They employ various strategies to convince him to join their respective sides.

Sora, a Japanese boy who was summoned to another world, gained the skill "Walking." Its effect is that "no matter how much he walks, he never gets tired." Because of this weak skill, the king expelled him from the group of summoned heroes. But when Sora starts walking in another world, he suddenly levels up!
 
Walking had a hidden effect of "gaining 1 EXP for each step taken." He acquired useful skills such as 'Appraisal,' 'Alchemy,' and healing magic...

Getting one skill after another, he became talented just by walking! The adventure to encounter and touch the unknown is about to begin!
description.pt-br:
Sora, um garoto japonês que foi convocado para outro mundo, ganhou a habilidade “Caminhar”. Seu efeito é que “não importa o quanto ande, ele nunca se cansa”. Por causa dessa habilidade fraca, o rei o expulsou do grupo de heróis convocados. Mas quando Sora começa a andar em outro mundo, ele subitamente sobe de nível!

Caminhar tinha um efeito oculto de “ganhar 1 EXP para cada passo dado”. Ele adquiriu habilidades úteis como 'Avaliação', 'Alquimia' e magia de cura...

Adquirindo uma habilidade após a outra, ele se tornou talentoso apenas andando! A aventura de encontrar e tocar o desconhecido está prestes a começar!

description.en: Jay Jin is the headstrong teenage rebel, determined to prove she's serious about making art. J. Max is the tall debonair foreigner, in Korea on business, with more–much more–to his background than he lets on. On the surface, it would seem as though Jay and J. have nothing in common… until a chance encounter in a hotel lobby sparks a mysterious attraction. Will true love prove strong enough to overcome the language barrier, not to mention the thousands of miles separating two attractive people? Then there are the interventions of friends and family who think they know best… as well as a disastrous encounter with spicy chicken kebab!

title.en: Kimi Shi ni Tamafu Koto Nakare

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi Shi ni Tamafu Koto Nakare

altTitles.en: You Must Not Give Yourself to Death

altTitles.ja: 君死ニタマフ事ナカレ

description.en: In the future, supernatural powers not only exist but have become science fact. The “Special Abilities Private High School” is established in order to utilize students’ powers for the military. Students are roped onto the battlefield without knowing the meaning of the fight, whether it will save their lives…or spell their demise.
description.pt-br: No futuro, poderes sobrenaturais não apenas existem, como também se tornaram fatos científicos. O "Colégio Particular de Habilidades Especiais" foi criado para que esses poderes fossem utilizados para o exército. Estudantes são jogados no campo de batalha sem saber o porquê de estarem lutando, se isso salvará suas vidas... ou acabará com elas.

description.en:
During the last war, Mo Feng decide to commit suicide and die along with the enemies!

But he woke up 8 years into the future, he now has the initiative to find out method to win against the enemy.

Can he change the human's life? Will they find the method first?

altTitles.pt-br: A Bruxa gênia perdeu seu MP

altTitles.vi: Nàng Phù Thủy Thiên Tài Hết Mana Rồi!

description.en: Nayu, the one in a million genius witch who has been the talk of the town, has run out of magic! The price for all the things she has been allowed to do because of her brilliance is coming back to the former genius witch like a boomerang... Then, she meets her past student "Komugi" who loves her very much. This is a boomerang love comedy of karmic retribution by a former genius witch who can't be left alone even though it stings a little, abandoned by her magical powers!
description.pt-br: Nayu, aquela em um milhão de bruxas geniais que tem sido o assunto da cidade, ficou sem magia! O preço por todas as coisas que ela foi autorizada a fazer por causa de seu brilhantismo está voltando para a ex-bruxa genial como um bumerangue... Então, ela lembrou de seu ex-aluno "Komugi", que a ama muito. Esta é uma comédia de amor de retribuição cármica por uma ex-bruxa genial que não pode ser deixada sozinha, mesmo que doa um pouco, abandonada por seus poderes mágicos!

description.en:
Sophie, a boy with vampire and human blood, is transferred from an orphanage to an institution called Clan. The school houses vampire boys who have reached their Cocoon period, or puberty in human terms. Sophie has a fateful encounter with a boy named Ul while being coldly greeted by the vampires around him. As Ul continues to research the “power of immortality” that vampires once possessed, he learns of the existence of TRUMP, the original vampire that is said to live forever, and begins to crave eternal life.

Eventually, Sophie and Ul become entangled in the deep fate surrounding the legend of immortality...

A manga adaptation of the origin story of playwright Kenichi Suemitsu’s popular series! A Gothic school fantasy that beautifully spins the conflicts of impressionable and sensitive boysー!
description.ja: 吸血種<ヴァンプ>と人間の血が流れる少年ソフィは、養護院からクランと呼ばれる施設へと入所した。そこは繭期――人間でいうところの思春期を迎えた吸血種の少年たちが集う学園。周囲の吸血種から冷ややかな目で迎えられる中、ソフィはある一人の少年と運命的な出会いを果たす。劇作家・末満健一の人気シリーズの原点となる物語をコミック化!! 繊細かつ多感な少年たちの葛藤を美しく紡ぎ出すゴシック学園ファンタジー!
description.vi: Câu chuyện xoay quanh Sophie Anderson - một con lai giữa con người và ma cà rồng (Dhampir), bị khinh ghét vì sự không thuần khiết. Tuy vậy, Sophie vẫn vượt lên những trở ngại với trái tim cao quý và luôn đầy tự hào về dòng máu của mình.

description.en:
I was born with the ability to enter other people's dreams. And I thought that in this life, I would have an easy life as a count when... 

"I don't think Lady Miena will survive this winter." 

Another life with a limited lifespan... To make matters worse, my family is going broke trying to save me. Before I die, I need to pay back our debt and all the money wasted on me! I was just trying to collect useful information and money before passing away when... 

"Who are you?"

"An angel... no you don't look quite right..."

"You entered my dream without a hint of fear."

I fear I have entered a dream I should've have touched.

The popular gal who was my childhood friend is secretly uploading provocative selfies!? In his quest to uncover the secret of this popular girl, high school boy Riku discovers that his own deeply hidden emotions were being observed by someone else… A sweet yet suffocatingly intense blend of youth, love, and suspense.

description.pt-br: O estudante do ensino médio Kaguya, que passa seus dias brigando, decide sair do time de delinquentes por causa de seu amor por Manami. Ao sair da equipe, Kaguya passa pelo "ritual de quase morte", onde é espancado pelos membros, o que o leva a perder a memória. Sem saber onde está ou qual é o seu nome, Kaguya se depara com...?!

title.en: Global Freeze: I Created an Apocalypse Shelter

altTitles.zh: Quan Qiu Bing Feng: Wo Dazaole Mori Anquan Wu

altTitles.en: Freezing The World: I Built A Doomsday Safehouse

altTitles.zh: Quán Qiú Bīng Fēng: Wǒ Dǎzàole Mòrì Ānquán Wū

altTitles.en: The World Is Frozen: I Built a Doomsday Safe House

altTitles.zh: 全球冰封: 我打造了末日安全屋

description.en:
The world is plunged into an icy age, and 95% of humanity is wiped out! In his previous life, our hero Zhang Yi was tragically killed by the very people he helped, thanks to his kind heart.

But fear not, for Zhang Yi has been reborn and now possesses the awesome power – space manipulation! He's gone completely bonkers hoarding supplies for the icy apocalypse and is ready to rule the frozen wasteland! He vows to unleash a hundred times the pain on those who harmed him in the past!
description.pt-br: O mundo mergulhou numa era gelada e 95% da humanidade foi exterminada! Em sua vida anterior, nosso herói Zhang Yi foi tragicamente morto pelas mesmas pessoas que ajudou, graças ao seu bom coração. Mas não tema, pois Zhang Yi renasceu e agora possui o incrível poder de manipulação do espaço! Ele ficou completamente maluco acumulando suprimentos para o apocalipse gelado e está pronto para governar o deserto congelado! Ele promete desencadear cem vezes mais dor naqueles que o prejudicaram no passado!

title.en: I Have Nine Quadrillion Simp Gold Coins

altTitles.vi: Ta Có 90 Tỷ Tiền Liếm Cẩu!

altTitles.en: I Have 90 Billion Licking Gold Coins

description.en: Down-and-out university student Chen Yuan, devotedly pursues Goddess Lin Shutong for three years, gets kicked in the face. In his grief, he accidentally activates the “Licking Dog System” with a memory of 90 trillion Licking Dog Money, solely for licking women. The more you spend, the more you get back, and you can also obtain various attribute bonuses, transforming into a little superhero. It's called the Licking Dog System, but do I really want to be a licking dog? As long as I lick enough, I'll be the king. As long as I prove my love with enough money, I can turn the goddess into my licking dog! At this moment, Chen Yuan, who has undergone a great awakening, embarks on his life as a rich and licking dog.

altTitles.ja: こまえーきイチャイチャ漫画

title.en: Oroka na Tenshi wa Akuma to Odoru

altTitles.ru: Неразумный ангел в пляске с демонами | Неразумный ангел в танце с демоном

altTitles.ja: 愚かな天使は悪魔と踊る

altTitles.vi: Thiên sứ Ngu muội Nhảy múa cùng Ác ma
天使愚眛趂𦨂共恶魔 (Nom Script)

altTitles.en: The Foolish Angel Dances with the Devil

description.en: Masatora Akutsu has just transferred into class in Japan from a long way away - all the way from Hell, to be exact. Akutsu is a demon who's come to Earth to find someone who can motivate the forces of Hell to fight back against the invading Heavenly army. He immediately sets his sights on one of his classmates, the kind and beautiful Lily Amane, but ends up in way over his head when it turns out Lily has some secrets of her own!
description.ja: 堕落した悪魔たちにやる気を出させるため悪魔たちのアイドルとなる人間を捜しに人間界に降りてきた阿久津雅虎。彼は早くもアイドル候補・天音リリーを見つけ勧誘する。しかし、リリーの正体は阿久津たち悪魔の天敵の「天使」で!? 自らの身と仲間を守るためリリーを堕天させんとする阿久津と野望のため阿久津の更正を決意する
description.pt: Masatora Akutsu acabou de ser transferido para uma turma ni Japão de muito muito longe - todo o caminho desde o Inferno, para ser exato. Akutsu é um demônio que veio à Terra para encontrar alguém que possa motivar as forças do Inferno a contra atacar o exército invasor do Paraíso. Ele imediatamente coloca os olhos em um dos seus colegas, a gentil e bonita Lily Amane, mas acaba sendo muito para ele aguentar quando acaba descobrindo que a Lily tem alguns segredos dela mesmo!
description.pt-br: Masatora Akutsu acabou de ser transferido para uma turma ni Japão de muito muito longe -todo o caminho desde o Infernio, para ser exato. Akutsu é um demônio que veio à Terra para encontrar alguém que possa motivar as forças do Inferno a contra atacar o exército invasor do Paraíso. Ele imediatamente coloca os olhos em um dos seus colegas, a gentil e bonita Lily Amane, mas acaba sendo muito para ele aguentar quando acaba descobrindo que a Lily tem alguns segredos dela mesmo!

description.en: Baphomet is the ruthless, dispassionate lord of the Abyssal Tower, a mysterious, monster-filled dungeon plaguing the human world. Many Hunters seek to defeat him and bring the tower down to no avail. Despite his demonic power, Baphomet grows curious about humanity. One day, Baphomet is defeated by Raven, the strongest Hunter, and realizes that his true wish is to be just like the humans he previously looked down on. In death, he is granted his wish, as he awakens as a human – without his powers!
description.fr:
Baphomet, le boss de la , attend un chasseur fort capable de se battre à armes égales contre lui.

Lorsqu’il s’est lassé de ces combats répétitifs, il a commencé à s’intéresser au monde de l’humanité grâce aux trophées qu’il avait obtenus des chasseurs morts.

Dans le même temps, il fut de plus en plus fasciné par l’existence des humains lorsque le puissant chasseur dont il avait toujours rêvé apparut devant lui.

Finalement, Baphomet essaie de devenir lui-même un humain…

title.en: The Kept Man of the Princess Knight

description.en:
Matthew is just another parasite in the chaotic dungeon city of Gray Neighbor. People say he’s a lazy weakling who gambles and drinks away all the money he gets from his keeper, princess knight Arwin. 

Or so people say...

But the truth is, no one in this town knows what he’s really like — a ruthless protector who works in the shadows and will do whatever it takes for the sake of his mistress.
description.ja:
ここは世界最後の迷宮都市《灰色の隣人（グレイ・ネイバー）》。迷宮に挑む冒険者と、冒険者相手の商売人、それらに群がる有象無象が巣くう街。

この街に住む冒険者の一人・《深紅の姫騎士》の二つ名を持つアルウィンは、祖国復興という崇高な志を胸に日々迷宮に挑んでいた。

一方そんな姫騎士様の「ヒモ」・マシューは、姫騎士様にお小遣いをもらって酒場や娼館に入り浸るばかり…。だが町中からバカにされている彼の本当の姿を知る者はいない。

すべては姫騎士様のために―――。

まばゆい姫騎士様の影で暗躍する、一人のヒモの生き様とは……?

title.en: S-kyuu Guild wo Tsuihousareta kedo, Jitsu wa Ore dake Dragon no Kotoba ga Wakaru no de, Kidzuita Toki ni wa Ryuu Kishi no Chouten wo Kiwametemashita

altTitles.ja: S級ギルドを追放されたけど、実は俺だけドラゴンの言葉がわかるので、気付いたときには竜騎士の頂点を極めてました。

altTitles.en: I've Been Kicked Out of an S-Rank Guild. But Only I Can Communicate With Dragons. Before I Knew It, I Became the Greatest Dragon Knight

description.en:
A super-class dragoon group-Cyril, a boy who was banished from the S-class guild "Lindworm" for some reason. What he had hidden was... the ability to "talk" with the dragons, which was unconventional!

Cyril who met unique dragons and launched his own guild. Perhaps because of its extraordinary qualities, the level of the guild soars at the fastest rate in history! Cyril, whose arm was recognized, will make a name for himself as a non-standard dragon knight.
description.ja:
超一流の竜騎士集団――Ｓ級ギルド『リントヴルム』からとある理由で追放された少年・シリル。彼が隠し持っていたのは……竜と“会話”ができるという、常識破りの能力だった！
ユニークな竜たちと出会い、自らのギルドを立ち上げたシリル。その驚異的な素質ゆえか、ギルドのレベルは史上最速の勢いで急上昇！　腕を認められたシリルは、規格外な竜騎士として名を馳せていく――！

description.en:
His more-than-friends, less-than-lovers cousin is so cute that he could die!!!!? 

Nozomu is a boy staying at his uncle's house over summer vacation. In the countryside, where there are no convenience stores, or any busses even, the boy has a problem. That problem is his younger cousin, Sou! He’s being led around by this tanned, energetic girl day after day and can’t show her the dignity befitting his older age! 

On top of that, whether intentional or not, he’s getting flustered by Sou’s inviting demeanor. Eventually, Nozomu couldn’t take his eyes off Sou and is falling more and more under her spell...!!? With a “cousin” like this, his reason is having a hard time hanging on! 

This is a romcom with a guy who’s going under from all his tanned cousin’s teasing!
description.ja:
友達以上恋人未満な従妹が死ぬほど可愛い!!!!?

夏休みの間、叔父の家に過ごすことになった少年・望。コンビニもない、バスも来ない、ないない尽くしの田舎で彼にはある悩みがあった。

その原因は「従妹」の爽!! 褐色元気っ娘の彼女に毎回からかわれては年上の威厳を見せられないでいた！ しかも、天然なのか意図的なのか分からない爽の誘ってくるような仕草にドキッとする始末。いつしか、望は彼女のことが目を離せず、ドンドン爽に攻略されていって……!!?

こんな「従妹」がいてくれたら理性が持たない!? からかい上手の褐色従妹ちゃんによるお兄ちゃん攻略ラブコメ!!!!!

description.en: A young boy named Toshio and his friends, while exploring an abandoned factory, are taken captive by gangsters. Toshi unwittingly discovers a signal device that will summon the cyborg superhero Electric Man Arrow. Arrow comes to the rescue, and, after vanquishing the gangsters' giant robot, entrusts Toshio with the signal device. However, the gangsters' mysterious leader X Fighter learns of this and uses Toshio in his plot to frame Arrow for a string of deadly sabotages. When Arrow finally confronts X Fighter for an explosive showdown, the shadowy link between the two superhumans is finally revealed. In the final chapter of this volume, Arrow faces an entirely different sort of problem, what to do with a gigantic dinosaur that scientists have discovered deep below the earth.

altTitles.es-la: No te burles de mi, Nagatoro

altTitles.ja: イジらないで、長瀞さん

altTitles.th: ยัยตัวแสบแอบน่ารัก นางาโทโระ

altTitles.ar: لا تلعبي معي يا آنسة ناغاتورو

altTitles.en: Don't Toy With Me, Miss Nagatoro!

altTitles.pl: Nie drocz się ze mną, Nagatoro!

description.en:
Naoto Hachiouji —our spineless— MC (Known also as "Senpai") is a second-year high school student and a loner who spends his afternoons at the Arts Club room. He attracts the attention of one of his schoolmates, a sadistic freshman girl named Nagatoro. However, in between the bullying and teasing, something else begins to blossom.

A lovey-dovey(…?) story between a shy nerd and an S-Dere (Sadistic Tsundere) begins.

---

**Links:**

- Alternative Official English - [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10042/episode/313808) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/dont-toy-with-me-miss-nagatoro/)
description.es:
Naoto Hachioji está en segundo de bachillerato, es un chico tan tímido e introvertido como buen dibujante. Un día, mientras busca un sitio donde sentarse a dibujar en la biblioteca, se le caen las páginas del manga que hacía, justo al lado de un grupo de chicas que, al verlas, se ríen de él en su cara y se van… excepto una estudiante de primero, Hayase Nagatoro, que básicamente empieza a darle caña hasta hacerlo llorar.

Desde entonces, Nagatoro y consecuentemente sus amigas, no van a parar de rayar a su “senpai” y molestarlo de todas las maneras posibles… Pero hay tres cosas a tener en cuenta: Nagatoro es especialmente tocanarices cuando están a solas, se molesta bastante si sus amigas se pasan con él, y en definitiva lo que ella busca es que su senpai salga de su burbuja autoimpuesta para que se divierta y conozca un poco el mundo que lo rodea… y quizás algo más…
description.ja: 憎たらしいけど愛おしい。苦しいのに傍にいたい。あなたの中の何かが目覚める、“Sデレ少女”の物語。
description.pl:
Naoto Hachiouji to nieśmiały chłopak, którego mało co przeraża tak, jak wredne dziewczyny. Nic więc dziwnego, że jego największym szkolnym koszmarem zostaje Nagatoro – koleżanka z niższego roku, która obrała go sobie za cel, regularnie serwując mu atrakcje z pogranicza wojskowej fali i końskich zalotów. Choć wydawać by się mogło, że szkolne życie chłopaka na zawsze pozostanie pasmem nieszczęść, nieoczekiwanie relacja tych dwojga zaczyna zmierzać w niespodziewanym kierunku…

(źródło: Studio JG)
description.ru: Нагаторо - переведённая ученица в старшей школе, которой нравится дразнить своего семпая. Но он всё стерпит. И пусть ему придётся пройти через все виды издевательств - он всё простит, потому что влюблён.
description.es-la: A la estudiante de preparatoria Hayase Nagatoro le encanta pasar su tiempo libre haciendo una cosa, ¡y eso es molestar a su Senpai! Después de que Nagatoro y sus amigos se topan con los dibujos del aspirante a artista, disfrutan molestando sin piedad al tímido Senpai. Nagatoro decide continuar con su cruel juego y lo visita a diario para poder obligar a Senpai a hacer lo que le interese en ese momento, especialmente si eso lo hace sentir incómodo. Ligeramente interesado por Nagatoro y algo temeroso de ella, Senpai está constantemente involucrado en sus payasadas mientras sus intereses, pasatiempos, apariencia e incluso personalidad se usan en su contra mientras ella se entretiene a sus expensas. A medida que pasa el tiempo, Senpai se da cuenta de que no le desagrada la presencia de Nagatoro, y los dos desarrollan una amistad incómoda mientras uno soporta pacientemente las payasadas del otro.
description.pt-br: Nagatoro é uma menina de primeiro ano na escola que adora fazer bullying com seu Senpai. Mas ele aceita isso, mesmo depois de ter passado por todos os tipos de situações humilhantes e embaraçosas, porque ele está apaixonado por ela.

title.en: Totsugi Okureta Kitsune ga Yome ni Kuru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 嫁ぎ遅れた狐が嫁に来る話

altTitles.ja-ro: Totsugi Okureta Kitsune ga Yome ni Kuru Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story of the Fox Who Was Late Getting Married and Came to be My Bride

description.en: One day, Goro is taking a walk on the mountain behind his house and comes across a fox lying upside down on the side of the road... The fox yells 'Hey you! Got a moment?'  And well, if you've seen the title you know the rest.  This is a cute and fluffy romcom about a fox's wedding(?).

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

description.en:
A story about a ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

altTitles.ja: ちえりの恋は8メートル

altTitles.pt-br: O amor de Chieri tem 8 metros

description.en:
An ordinary high school student, Yumeji Kotaki, is transferred to his class by his childhood friend, Chieri Omine, who has grown to 8 meters in height! Yumeji is assigned as "caretaker" to support Chieri's school life. Their daily life is full of excitement due to the height difference! The height difference is nothing to worry about!

The start of a literally larger-than-life romcom!
description.pt-br:
Uma aluna transferida que tem 8 metros de altura...?! 
Amigos de infância se reencontram, mas nem tudo é como antes… Uma mudança na relação entre Chieri e Yumeji, acompanhe o desenrolar desta comédia romântica gigantesca.

altTitles.th: เภสัชกรเทพสองโลก

description.en:
A young pharmacologist and researcher in Japan died from overworking, and was reincarnated in a Medieval Parallel Europe. He was reincarnated as a 10-year-old apprentice to a famous Royal Court pharmacist, had attained an inhuman skills of ability to see through disease, material creation, and material destruction.  
  
In a society in which dubious medical practice are rampant, price gouging thru the monopoly of the pharmacist guild, and good medicine aren't available to the commoners. He was recognized by the Emperor at that time and opened a Pharmacy at the corner of the town. He will wipe out the fraud that has swept the world, and deliver to the commoners a truly effective medicine that was developed using present day pharmacology. Thus the boy pharmacist will cheat by using his previous knowledge to create innovative medicines while helping the people of the parallel world, a story about living his new life to the fullest this time.
description.pt-br: Um jovem farmacêutico e pesquisador no Japão morreu de trabalho excessivo e foi reencarnado em uma Europa Paralela Medieval. Ele foi reencarnado como um aprendiz de 10 anos para um famoso farmacêutico da Royal Court, tinha alcançado habilidades desumanas de habilidade para ver a doença, a criação material e a destruição material. Em uma sociedade em que a prática médica duvidosa é desenfreada, o aumento dos preços através do monopólio da aliança farmacêutica e uma boa medicina não estão disponíveis para os plebeus. Ele foi reconhecido pelo imperador naquele momento e abriu uma farmácia na esquina da cidade. Ele eliminará a fraude que varreu o mundo e entregará aos plebeus um medicamento verdadeiramente eficaz que foi desenvolvido usando a farmacologia atual. Assim, o menino farmacêutico enganará usando seu conhecimento prévio para criar medicamentos inovadores, ajudando as pessoas do mundo paralelo, uma história sobre como viver sua nova vida ao máximo desta vez. A popular web novel agora vem em forma de manga!

description.en:
A completely new work by Fukumoto Nobuyuki of the *Kaiji* series!

Nikaidou Susumu, 35, has been unsuccessful in the professional test for 10 consecutive years, despite receiving support from his club.

What awaits him in the future, as he is unable to give up the title of professional golfer, is either heaven or hell...

There are gamblers out there who even bet their lives as ante. But to secure the integrity of these life-threatening gambles, a violent and powerful organization by the name of “Kakerou” referees these games as a neutral party. Follow Baku Madarame a.k.a. Usogui (The Lie Eater) as he gambles against maniacal opponents at games – such as Escape the Abandoned Building, Old Maid, and Hangman – to ultimately “out-gamble” and control the neutral organization of Kakerou itself.  


---

**Links:**  
- [OAV on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=14163)
description.ru:
Есть игроки, которые ставят на кон свою жизнь. Чтобы сохранить целостность таких смертельно-опасных игр, жестокая и могущественная организация «Кагэро» судит их, как нейтральная сторона.
Наш герой — Баку Мадарамэ, «Пожиратель лжи». Игрок, чья цель — переиграть и в конце взять под контроль саму нейтральную организацию «Кагэро».

---

(Source: [readmanga](https://mintmanga.live/pojiratel_lji))
description.es-la: Hay jugadores que incluso apuestan su vida como apuesta. Pero para asegurar la integridad de estas apuestas que ponen en peligro la vida, una violenta y poderosa organización llamada "Kakerou" arbitra estos juegos como parte neutral. Sigue a Baku Madarame, también conocido como Usogui (El Devorador de Mentiras), mientras se enfrenta a oponentes maníacos en juegos como "Escapar del Edificio Abandonado", "La Vieja Doncella" y "El Ahorcado", para acabar jugando más que la propia organización neutral de Kakerou
